mapper.select: SELECT /* selectLOGIN */ T1.id , T1.name , T1.email , T1."emailVerified" , T1.image , T1.password , T1.regi_dttm AS "regiDttm" , to_char(T2.restric_dttm, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "restricDttm" , CASE WHEN (COALESCE(T2.fail_cnt, 0) = 5 AND T2.restric_dttm > now() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS "restricYn" FROM users T1 FULL OUTER JOIN t_memma02 T2 USING (email) WHERE email = #{email}

choose.when: UPDATE t_memma02 SET fail_cnt = 0 , upd_dttm = now() WHERE email=#{reqEmail}
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO t_memma02 (email, fail_cnt, acc_restriction_cnt) VALUES (#{reqEmail}, 1, 0) ON CONFLICT (email) DO UPDATE /* upsertRetrictionLog */ SET fail_cnt = CASE WHEN t_memma02.fail_cnt = 5 THEN 1 ELSE t_memma02.fail_cnt + 1 END , acc_restriction_cnt = CASE WHEN t_memma02.fail_cnt = 4 THEN t_memma02.acc_restriction_cnt+1 ELSE t_memma02.acc_restriction_cnt END , restric_dttm = CASE WHEN t_memma02.fail_cnt = 4 THEN (now() + interval '5 minute' * (t_memma02.acc_restriction_cnt + 1)) AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' ELSE t_memma02.restric_dttm END , upd_dttm = now() AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul'
